column4: hello, I am having troubles with sound in ubuntu 7.10. Every other boot I have no sound. I am using the latest version of alsa, and am doing a normal boot (no dual boot)
hello, I am having troubles with sound in ubuntu 7.10. Every other boot I have no sound. I am using the latest version of alsa, and am doing a normal boot (no dual boot). Can anyone help me?
Did you install Ubuntu with Wubi, or running it inside Windows XP/Vista/ME/Earlier?
no, it is a normal install
ubuntu gutsy gibbon, not ubuntu studio
Multimedia audio controller: ATI Technologies Inc IXP SB400 AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 02)
Did you make sure nothing in alsa is muted?
yes, the sound works every other boot
no, I tried both with the onboard and pcm speakers
I think you need a new driver. Google [instert driver name here] for lniux.
thanks, I will give it a try
